name: HIND YUVA SHAKTI
briefDescription: The Organization has been promoted in the year 2006 with an aim to serve the poorer community for their livelihood improvement on sustainable basis. The Organization believed to work for the youths within their active participation. The organization was established in 2006 and worked socio- economic, moral awareness for youth's and women, HIND YUVA SHAKTI is affiliated by Nehru Yuva Kendra, Bhagalpur (Ministry of Youth Affairs & Sports, Govt. of India) in 2006. It was also registered in 2011 under Trust registration act and registration no. is 12849/09-09-2011.The Organization regularly organized Health and Family Welfare Program, Vocational Training Program, Women Welfare Program, Many types of National Day Programs, Sports Program.
